resources.string: Click OK to send the error report via email.
You might add your comments about the problem below:
Press and hold to check or uncheck a workout
Please choose a name for the workout!
Please select at least one exercise!
Why don\'t you try one of these exercises in your next workout
Do you really want to delete this workout
There haven\'t been any workouts created yet.

This application is supposed to support you with your personal training. It provides the possibility to create many workouts after your own desires and helps you with the training. About 20 to 30 minutes of exercising per day, or at least 3 times a week, are enough to get you in shape and make you feel more fit and energetic.

If you want to slim down and to build muscles with your exercises I recommend a healthy nutrition in addition. Most of all you should take care of eating much protein and diminish the supply of carbs and sugar. So say \"Yes\" to meat, fish, eggs and vegetables and say \"No\" to all food that contains much sugar as well as pasta, potatoes and wheat products. So for the time beeing there is no more bakery products and only rarely fruits. Even though they are healthy they still contain fructose which would disturb your diet. If you still don\'t want to set your apple a day aside you can eat it right after your workout. This way you are providing energy to your body and your body can make good use of the fructose.

The exercises of this application are mostly bodyweight exercises. That means you can perform them without any aid or tools. You only need you own body. That way you can train wherever you are whenever you want!

In addition every exercise is linked to several tags so you know what effect the exercise has to your body. These tags in general represent difrent muscle groups. But they only tell you the crucial effect of one exercise. The enumeration of all muscles groups as well as their official designation would exceed the purpose of this application and thus were explicitly not integrated into this application.

The supervised training has the purpose to keep you from having to remember all of your workouts. By exercising with your saved workouts the apllication is able to lead you through the whole practice and you only have to press one button every now and then to get to your next exercise. This way it will be easier for to get and stay motivated for exercising because the next practice is just one click apart.

The warmup:
Right before every workout you should warm up properly. About 5 to 10 minues of moving your body with an increasing intensity are enough to prevent yourself from getting injured and to prepare your body for the upcoming practice.

The cooldown:
Often underrated but yet neccessary. Cooling down should be a as much of a part of your practice routine as the warming up. That is because it slowly calms your body down and prepares it for the recovery phase. If you did exercises that mostly had an impact on your stamina it is important to stay in more relaxed motion to slowly reduce your pulse. To prevent your muscles from hardening after training and to stay agile relaxation and stretching exercises are also an important part of the cooldown phase.

If you want to report an error or if you have any questions or suggestions please write an email to:

contact@couchdev.net

Your email address will be neither stored permanently nor used for commercial purposes or similar things. Only the email you write will of course be stored so you can get an answer.
